test_scenarios.name: P0 - Ride Booking: Successful Ride Request
test_scenarios.expected_result: Ride request is successfully placed. A driver is assigned, and estimated time of arrival (ETA) is displayed.

test_scenarios.name: P0 - Food Order: Place a food order for delivery
steps: Add an item to the cart.
test_scenarios.expected_result: Food order is placed successfully. Order confirmation screen appears with estimated delivery time and order details.

test_scenarios.name: P0 - Account Login: Successful Login
steps: Enter a valid email address or phone number.
test_scenarios.expected_result: User is successfully logged in and redirected to their account dashboard or home page.
